title: On a cold winter night
author: Larissa Meyer
teaser: Her gaze glides over the sparsely decorated table. Deep scratches have settled into the dark wood, revealing a mysterious pattern of light strokes. Next to the square cloth, on which the orange flower still lingers, is an almost burnt-down white candle, its wax running down the sides like tears and drying into an opaque ice at the base. She thoughtfully puts the cup back, leaving the spoon carelessly in the cup.

title: Lie
author: Larissa Meyer
teaser: You ask me if I ever lied? If I ever lied to all of you? Did I? I know the beginning, when they finally respect you. They notice you. You are somebody! You are worth looking at! That feeling was like a drug. It was beautiful, warm, but darker than anything else I knew before. Captured in my addiction, I wanted even more of it.

title: Deadly gold
author: Larissa Meyer
teaser: Two sides of a valley that could not be more different. Divided by the wide lake, whose deepest point, according to the ancient stories, is the center of the earth. Two worlds, one shining, the other covered by dark shadows. Two stories, two destinies, of completely different people. Connected by the passion of writing and the pursuit of the other side.

title: Wind
author: Larissa Meyer
teaser: Shrouded in fog, dead silent, it lies there, suddenly the smell of life has disappeared. The young man blinks in amazement and looks again. Dark figures approach, stepping out of the fog in rows. With practiced hands, he steers his boat to the harbor, and with a heavy groan it arrives at the dock.

title: Invisible fight
author: Larissa Meyer
teaser: The thick, steady drip is drowned out by the cheerful shouting of children a few meters away. It dies away only when the school bell rings loudly twice and the small steps hurriedly depart. The sun burns with unrelenting heat on the dark concrete, which is crisscrossed with colored markings. The last door slams shut with a bang and a dead silence spreads.
